question: what is the first line of an http request to the server
vanilla_rag_result:
The first line of an HTTP request to the server is known as the request line. It typically includes the HTTP method (such as GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), the requested resource (URL), and the HTTP version being used (such as HTTP/1.1). An example of a request line would be:

```
GET /index.html HTTP/1.1
```
